name: SWIFT (itch) (AlexGuenther)
description:
SWIFT

SWIFT is a dynamic flight highscore game. You survive by flying through glowing rings within short time. Avoid getting stuck on the way. You really don't have time for this. Each ring recovers your lifespan for the next seconds of your life. 

Follow different routes through the level as speed and challenge gradually increases. Though it is an arcade type of game, the experience is heavily atmospheric. 

Therefore, the game offers additionally an exploration mode. Relax after the race, take your time, explore the environment and find the hidden portal. 

Plug in your controller and have a flight.

Developed by: Huy Vu, Anna Grinenko, Noah Dettki, Alexander Günther Supported by: Prof. Susanne Brandhorst, Prof. Thomas Bremer, Sven Thomas Gorholt Created in GAME DESIGN Bachelor Studies, HTW Berlin
